title: Biostats uOttawa
text:
EnglishFrançais



Biostatistic resources for uOttawa students
This regroup the different resources developed for the biostatistic courses at the university of Ottawa by Julien Martin

Courses at uOttawa

Undergraduate courses (BIO 4X58):

BIO4158 Applied biostatistics with R (course site / course manual)
BIO4558 Biostatistiques appliquées avec R(course site / course manual)

Graduate courses

BIO8940: Advanced biostatistics and open science (course site / course manual)


Graduate students can take both courses. Bio4x58 are intro classes that expect no or limited knowledge of R and no or limited knowledge of stats. Bio8940 expect a functional knowledge of R (loading data, running basic linear models, and making plots) as well as a good understanding of linear models (i.e. Bio8940 is a great next steps after completing Bio4x58).


Extra resources

An introduction to R

english (course / course manual)
french (course / course manual)
